text: Eriston (), or Eristus or Eristos (Ἠρίστῳς), was an ancient inland town on the island of Tenos. It is mentioned in ancient inscriptions.IG XII,5 946; August Böckh, Inscr. 2336, 2337. Its site is unlocated, but may be the same as Come. ==References== Category:Populated places in the ancient Aegean islands Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Tinos
title: Eriston
